1.descricao: Whenever Abyssal Nightstalker attacks and isn't blocked, defending player discards a card.

regras.texto: An ability that triggers when something "attacks and isn't blocked" triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

2.descricao: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

3.descricao: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

4.descricao: When Brutal Nightstalker enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

5.descricao: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

6.descricao: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

9.descricao: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.

11.descricao: Dakmor Sorceress's power is equal to the number of Swamps you control.

12.descricao: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

13.descricao:
Flying

When Foul Spirit enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land.

15.descricao: When Hidden Horror enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

regras.texto: When the ability resolves, you choose whether to sacrifice the creature or perform the other action. If you can't perform the other action, then you must sacrifice the creature.
If the creature is no longer on the battlefield when the ability resolves, you may still perform the action if you want.

16.descricao: Kiss of Death deals 4 damage to target opponent. You gain 4 life.

17.descricao: Whenever Lurking Nightstalker attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

21.descricao: Nightstalker Engine's power is equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

22.descricao: When Predatory Nightstalker enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent sacrifice a creature.

23.descricao: Prowling Nightstalker can't be blocked except by black creatures.

25.descricao: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. You lose 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

26.descricao: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

regras.texto: You must show the card you bring out of the graveyard to your opponent.
The creature being brought back is chosen on announcement and not on resolution of the spell because it is targeted.
A "creature card" is any card with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact, Enchantment, or Land. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature cards.

27.descricao: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

28.descricao: Return all Nightstalker permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then destroy all Swamps you control.

29.descricao: Swarm of Rats's power is equal to the number of Rats you control.

30.descricao:
Flying

When Vampiric Spirit enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life.

32.descricao: {T}: Apprentice Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

regras.texto: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

33.descricao: Armored Galleon can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

34.descricao: {T}: Return Coastal Wizard and another target creature to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

regras.texto: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

35.descricao: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

36.descricao: When Denizen of the Deep enters the battlefield, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.

37.descricao: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

regras.texto: The creatures and lands are only prevented from untapping during the targeted player's next untap step. They can still can untap during other player's untap steps.
No creatures or lands controlled by the player will untap during his or her next untap step. This includes those which entered the battlefield after Exhaustion resolved.

39.descricao: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into his or her graveyard.

41.descricao: Counter target creature or sorcery spell.

42.descricao: Until end of turn, you may tap lands you don't control for mana. Spend this mana only to cast spells.

43.descricao:
Cast Remove only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.

Return target attacking creature to its owner's hand.

44.descricao:
Flying

When Screeching Drake enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

45.descricao:
Flying

When Sea Drake enters the battlefield, return two target lands you control to their owner's hand.

regras.texto: When the ability resolves, if one of the lands has become an illegal target (because it's no longer on the battlefield, for example), you return the other one to your hand. If both of the lands have become illegal targets, the ability is countered. This has no effect on Sea Drake.

46.descricao: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

regras.texto: If there is only one card in your library, it goes to your hand.

47.descricao: Steam Frigate can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

49.descricao:
Flying

When Talas Explorer enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

51.descricao: {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

regras.texto: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

54.descricao: Take an extra turn after this one.

regras.texto: If multiple "extra turn" effects resolve in the same turn, take them in the reverse of the order that the effects resolved.

55.descricao: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

56.descricao: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.

57.descricao: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

59.descricao: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

regras.texto: The two creatures may have different owners and return to their respective owner's hands.

60.descricao: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.

61.descricao: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

64.descricao: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

65.descricao: You may have Deathcoil Wurm assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

regras.texto: If this creature is attacking a planeswalker, assigning its damage as though it weren't blocked means the damage is assigned to the planeswalker, not to the defending player.

When assigning combat damage, you choose whether you want to assign all damage to blocking creatures, or if you want to assign all of it to the defending player or planeswalker. You can't split the damage assignment between them.
You can decide to assign damage to the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creature has protection from green or damage preventing effects on it.
If blocked by a creature with banding, the defending player decides whether or not the damage is assigned "as though it weren't blocked".

66.descricao:
Cast Deep Wood only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.

Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

68.descricao: Tap any number of untapped creatures you control. You gain 4 life for each creature tapped this way.

69.descricao: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

regras.texto: Whether or not a creature has flying is only checked on resolution.

70.descricao: Ironhoof Ox can't be blocked by more than one creature.

71.descricao: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

regras.texto: If this creature is attacking a planeswalker, assigning its damage as though it weren't blocked means the damage is assigned to the planeswalker, not to the defending player.

When assigning combat damage, you choose whether you want to assign all damage to blocking creatures, or if you want to assign all of it to the defending player or planeswalker. You can't split the damage assignment between them.
You can decide to assign damage to the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creature has protection from green or damage preventing effects on it.
If blocked by a creature with banding, the defending player decides whether or not the damage is assigned "as though it weren't blocked".

73.descricao: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

75.descricao: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

regras.texto: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

You can find any card with the land type Forest, including Snow-Covered Forest or non-Basic lands like Tropical Island, Murmuring Bosk, or Stomping Ground. You can even find a card that is a land in addition to other types, such as Dryad Arbor.

76.descricao: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

77.descricao: {T}: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

regras.texto: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

79.descricao: Norwood Riders can't be blocked by more than one creature.

80.descricao: Whenever Norwood Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

82.descricao: Whenever Razorclaw Bear becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

83.descricao: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

84.descricao: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

85.descricao: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

86.descricao: Whenever Sylvan Basilisk becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature.

87.descricao: Sylvan Yeti's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.

88.descricao: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

89.descricao: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

regras.texto: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.
Can fetch a snow land.

91.descricao: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

93.descricao: If Cunning Giant is unblocked, you may have it assign its combat damage to a creature defending player controls.

94.descricao: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

regras.texto: Whether or not a creature is without flying is only checked on resolution.

96.descricao: Sacrifice Goblin Firestarter: Goblin Firestarter deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

regras.texto: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

97.descricao: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

99.descricao: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.

100.descricao: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

regras.texto: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

You can search for any card with the creature type Goblin, including Creature or Tribal cards. Older cards of type "Summon Goblin" and "Summon Goblins" also count. You can't search for cards that have Goblin in the name but don't have the creature type Goblin.

104.descricao: Target opponent chooses a creature he or she controls. Other creatures he or she controls can't block this turn.

105.descricao: Goblin War Strike deals damage equal to the number of Goblins you control to target player.

106.descricao: Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to each of two target creatures.

107.descricao: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.

108.descricao: When Magma Giant enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

110.descricao: When Ogre Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

114.descricao: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

115.descricao: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

regras.texto: If you manage to cast this during a main phase of your opponent's turn, that opponent's creatures will untap and that opponent will be able to attack again. It will not allow you to attack during their turn.
Abilities that trigger when a creature attacks, blocks, or is blocked will trigger during each combat that turn. Thus, a creature with Rampage will get the bonus added during each attack.
A creature that must attack each turn, must only attack once that turn. It is not forced into each attack that turn.
It only creates an additional combat and main phase if it resolves during a main phase.

116.descricao: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

118.descricao: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

119.descricao: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

120.descricao: Each player sacrifices four lands. Wildfire deals 4 damage to each creature.

121.descricao: Whenever Alaborn Cavalier attacks, you may tap target creature.

123.descricao: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

125.descricao: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

regras.texto: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

126.descricao: When Alaborn Zealot blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Alaborn Zealot.

127.descricao:
Flying

When Angel of Fury is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may shuffle it into your library.

regras.texto: If Angel of Fury is removed from the graveyard after the ability triggers but before it resolves, it won't get shuffled into its owner's library. Similarly, if a replacement effect has the Incarnation move to a different zone instead of being put into the graveyard, the ability won't trigger at all.

Angel of Fury's second ability is a leaves-the-battlefield ability. Because it works only from on the battlefield, it behaves differently than the _Lorwyn_ Incarnations. When Angel of Fury is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it will look back in time (to the point just before it left the battlefield) to see if its ability triggers. That means the following

128.descricao:
Flying

When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

129.descricao: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

134.descricao:
Target opponent draws a card.

You gain 7 life.

135.descricao: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

136.descricao: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.

137.descricao:
Cast Just Fate only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.

Destroy target attacking creature.

138.descricao: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.

regras.texto: If the spell fails because the target is not there or isn't legal, the owner does not gain any life.

139.descricao:
Cast Rally the Troops only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.

Untap all creatures you control.

140.descricao: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

regras.texto: Only creatures you control when Righteous Charge resolves will get +2/+2. Creatures that come under your control later in the turn will not.

141.descricao: Destroy all tapped creatures. You gain 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

142.descricao: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

regras.texto: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

143.descricao: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

144.descricao: {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

regras.texto: If a turn has multiple combat phases, the ability can only be activated before the beginning of the declare attackers step of the first combat phase in that turn.

145.descricao: Whenever Town Sentry blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

149.descricao:
Cast Warrior's Stand only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.

Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
